title: Which Linkin park songs are completely rap? - Quora

response.answer_text: Following are the few songs with completely rap given by Mike Shinoda. I would be giving you with the names of the album chronologically:- 1.Hybrid Theory(2001):- a)High Voltage:Very old one as this song was also as one of the tracks. b)Papercut:Rap is the basis of the song. But you will get vocals from Chester. 2.Meteora(2003):- a)Nobody’s Listening:Total rap song. At the start of the song japanese flute shakuhachi is played. 3)Minutes to Midnight(2007):-This album is very different from its predecessors.You will get to hear guitar solos and music is quite evolved not like they use nu metal but alternative rock. a)Hands Held High: Its a song about war.Personally I think it was written about US-Iraq war. b)Bleed it Out:Song about trying to make a perfect song but everytime it gets wrong. 4.A Thousand Suns:This album doesn’t much contain Mike’s solo rap performance. 5.Living Things: a)Until It Breaks b)Lost In the Echo:Best songs of LP.Though Chester sings few parts of the song. 6.The Hunting Party: a)All For Nothing  Mike Shinoda

Linkin Park doesn’t make complete rap songs. They consist of rap, guitar riffs, drum smash, Chester’s vocals and enchanting sounds. There are some songs of Linkin Park which constitute of rap by Mike Shinoda, around 60% to 90% of the complete songs are rap. Please note that the posted songs are having significance in rap part! Papercut Nobody’s Listening High Voltage Hands Held High Bleed It Out When They Come For Me Wretches and Kings Until It Breaks All For Nothing Lost In The Echo Credits :- https://www.youtube.com/user/linkinparktv (Linkin Park’s Youtube Channel)

Linkin Park doesn't have songs that are completely rap. UNLESS! You're willing to take some extra steps to find them. But that's annoying and difficult, so here:  LP Underground is Linkin Park’s yearly (I think?) album of unreleased tracks and demos, as well as being the name for their official fan club. I Have Not Begun, from LPU 10, is a song that’s entirely Mike being awesome.  Step Up is a song from the Hybrid Theory EP which isn't TECHNICALLY all rap, since it has some other weird spoken lyrics in there. And if you're looking for more rap from Mike Shinoda, you could check out Fort Minor, his side project.

Linkin Park songs arent’t entirely rap. They’re a hybrid of rap and rock mostly but this time they’re completely changing their music. Watch out for their new single- Heavy. But I suppose you might like the Eminem version of Somewhere I belong. Guilty All The Same has great rap too. Bleed it Out is mostly rap apart from the ending. Figure 09 is also pretty good too, and so is Lying From You. All things said, there are no songs that are completely rap. You might also like QWERTY. I think you’d probably like listening to Fort Minor songs if you like Mike Shinoda’s rap.

Completely rap, as in NO singing or screaming vocals whatsoever, right? Cool. That takes out all the other answers then. In no particular order : Dedicated ( 1999 Demo)I have not begun (2010 Demo)Grudge Match (2015 Demo)High Voltage - Reanimation versionAsbestos (2007 Demo)All their other songs and demos have some combination of screams and clean vocals, or are just purely instrumental.
Bleed It OutHigh VoltageAll for nothingPapercutIn the endSomewhere i belongI guess these are the only ‘Complete Rap’ songs of LP.A few more songs have Rap but these are the complete rap songs.
Funny how none of the people here have mentioned non album tracks which are completely rap or 95% rap. Some songs are:1. Dedicated2. Step Up3. Part Of Me4. High Voltage5. Reading My Eyes

If you want only raps by mike shinoda no chester bennington here is the list. #1.Cure For The Itch (Hybrid Theory). #2.Hands Held High (Minutes to Midnight). #3.Skin to Bone(Living Things) #4.Wastelands(Hunting party) #5.All for Nothing(Hunting party) IF YOU ARE A LINKIN PARK FAN THEN CHECKOUT FOR FORT MINOR … IT IS WHERE MIKE GOES SOLO. some notable songs are: remember the name,welcome,dedicated etc. PS:sorry for any mistake and misses.
Hands Held High High Voltage (the original EP version) Dedicated Until It Breaks (the end has singing) Sorry if I’m missing any!
